messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hello, is this a place?
This is 911.
Yes, what is your emergency?
My dad has been physically and emotionally abusing me.
What is your address?
He said I was acting perfect to my psychiatrist.
What address are you at?
Well, listen, at my psychiatrist, he, last month gave me a fever of 104 from stress, throwing up in a fever, and the psychiatrist said I could have died, and he laughed, and I just killed him.
And he's dead right now, because I can't take the physical abuse.
2645 Hamlin, 2645 Hamlin.
2645 Hamlin?
Yes, I'm being physically and mentally abused.
They know me in Arlington Heights. I can't take the physical and mental abuse. I'm being totally abused.
Where is your dad right now?
He's dead. He's lying on the ground.
Are you at 2645 Hamlin right now?
Hold on one second.
Hello, Displains. This is Northwest Central. Do you have a 2645 Hamlin in your town?
Pardon? 4645 Hamlin?
My dad has been mentally abusive. He could have killed me with 105 fever from stress.
All right, sir.
And he abuses me every day, and I can't take it anymore, and I took a knife to him, and I killed him.
Sir, where are you?
I'm in my house. I killed him because he was abusing me, and my psychiatrist said he could have killed me.
My mom told my dad that the psychiatrist said he could have killed me, and he said he didn't care if I died or not.
We are starting to trace the call now, sir.
Yes, yes. 2645 Hamlin. I mean Stratford, Stratford.
In what city?
Arlington Heights.
All right, thank you. We have dispatched the police. Stay on the line.
Sir?
Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
